channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: LegalZoom Promo Code: Exclusive 10% Off LLC Formations
item.description: Save on top services at LegalZoom, like LLC registration, incorporation, estate plans, and more with coupons and deals from WIRED.

item.title: Psychedelic Therapy Crashed and Burned. MAHA Might Bring It Back
item.description: Abuse allegations and infighting helped kill a campaign to legalize MDMA for medical use. Trumpworld is giving the therapy’s advocates hope for a seco...

item.title: Waymo taps Avis to manage robotaxi fleet in Dallas
item.description: Avis will handle general depot operations, including charging and maintaining the vehicles. Users will be able to hail a robotaxi through the Waymo ap...

item.title: 20% Off HP Coupon Code | July 2025
item.description: Save up to 60%, plus an extra 20% with HP promo codes for laptops, printers, PCs, and more tech.

item.title: AI data analyst startup Julius nabs $10M seed round
item.description: Julius is designed to act like a data scientist by analyzing and visualizing extensive datasets and then performing predictive modeling from natural l...

item.title: The Real Demon Inside ChatGPT
item.description: AI chatbots strip language of its historical and cultural context. Sometimes what looks like a satanic bloodletting ritual may actually be lifted from...

item.title: Age Verification Laws Send VPN Use Soaring—and Threaten the Open Internet
item.description: A law requiring UK internet users to verify their age to access adult content has led to a huge surge in VPN downloads—and has experts worried about t...

item.title: Harmonic, the Robinhood CEO’s AI math startup, launches an AI chatbot app
item.description: The chatbot app, which is available in beta on iOS and Android, lets users access its AI model, Aristotle.

item.title: Microsoft Edge is now an AI browser with launch of ‘Copilot Mode’
item.description: Microsoft's Edge browser introduces an AI-powered "Copilot Mode" for smarter web browsing.

item.title: Flexport sells former freight unicorn Convoy’s tech 2 years after buying it
item.description: The assets of Convoy are now in the hands of DAT Freight & Analytics.
